entries.title: The Amazfit Falcon flirts with premium watch territory
entries.description: Amazfit is raising its own bar, but does it get high enough?

entries.title: Step aside emulation, I restored my old Nintendo instead
entries.description: Weekend activity, learning project, or just plain nostalgia, restoring an old console can be a whole lot of fun!

entries.title: Retrofitting my rented home with SwitchBot smart home tools has been a lifesaver
entries.description: Retrofitting is a terrific way to build a smart home that can easily be disassembled later.

entries.title: A Microsoft foldable doesn’t make sense anymore, or does it?
entries.description: Samsung phones are basically Microsoft phones already, minus the underwhelming hardware and buggy software.
